Claim: "The summer sea ice dropped abruptly to levels not expected until 2050."
Implication: "The predicted 67-per-cent decline in polar bear numbers simply didn’t happen."
Referring expressions: summer sea ice, levels, 2050  polar bear numbers
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsAtLevels(a,b) and IsExpectedIn2050(c))))) -> (exists d (~IsPredicted(d)))
